body_html:
@dylanthomas It seems that msbuild cannot be found. Can you manually add it to PATH using command like this before build:

set "PATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\MSBuild\15.0\Bin;%PATH%"

And please check if msbuild.exe exists in the specified dir.
body:
@dylanthomas It seems that `msbuild` cannot be found. Can you manually add it to PATH using command like this before build:
```CMD
set "PATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\MSBuild\15.0\Bin;%PATH%"
```
And please check if `msbuild.exe` exists in the specified dir.
